attributes.action: Keep British Energy and its nuclear power stations under British ownership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know about the prospects of Gas shortages due to the pipelines being out of UK control, now we are faced with the sale of our nuclear power stations to a foreign country, when will this government put our longterm interests before shorterm gain?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
